Html:
The source code looks AWESOME, but when I fired it up in VS2008 and hit F5, I get the following error on ~/Default.aspx:

"The incoming request does not match any route."

I'm using VS2008 SP1 (v9.0.30729.1 SP) with .NET 3.5 SP1, Vista Business SP1, SQL Server 2005 SP2, and RC1 of ASP.NET MVC. I'm successfully running other MVC applications locally.

Before I spend time making changes to the code, I wanted to post here and see if there was something obvious I am not doing. I literally just opened /v2.x/Kigg.sln, set Kigg.Web to the startup project, and hit F5. 

Thanks in advance.
Check your connection string and make sure it's properly set for your SQL Server version.
Delete the Default.aspx, and run again it solve your issue.
